class.name: VisualScriptSwitch
class.brief_description: Branches program flow based on a given input's value.
class.description: Branches the flow based on an input's value. Use [b]Case Count[/b] in the Inspector to set the number of branches and each comparison's optional type. [b]Input Ports:[/b] - Sequence: [code]'input' is[/code] - Data (variant): [code]=[/code] - Data (variant): [code]=[/code] (optional) - Data (variant): [code]input[/code] [b]Output Ports:[/b] - Sequence - Sequence (optional) - Sequence: [code]done[/code]
